column6: CULLEN BUNN (DEADPOOL KILLOGY) and RON ACKINS (UNCANNY X-MEN SPECIAL) join JORDIE BELLAIRE on MOON KNIGHT! After the shocking events of MOON KNIGHT #12, Marc Spector is left picking up the pieces of what's left of his life. Don't miss this new exciting chapter of MOON KNIGHT!
column8: | artist:Ron Ackins | penciller (cover):Jordan Diane Bellaire | penciller (cover):Declan Shalvey | writer:Cullen Bunn
